targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_loan_balance') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_loan_balance') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.net_liquidation_value') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.net_liquidation_value') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_loan_balance') AS REAL) / 0.30) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_loan_balance') AS REAL) / 0.30) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (((CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_loan_balance') AS REAL) / 0.30) - CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL)) / CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) * 100) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (((CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_loan_balance') AS REAL) / 0.30) - CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL)) / CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) * 100) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) * 0.25) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) * 0.25) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) * 0.30) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) * 0.30) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.current.monthly_interest_expense') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.current.monthly_interest_expense') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) / CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.current.monthly_interest_expense') AS REAL)) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) / CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.current.monthly_interest_expense') AS REAL)) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.efficiency.roi_on_margin_capital_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.efficiency.roi_on_margin_capital_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.efficiency.net_benefit_of_leverage_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.efficiency.net_benefit_of_leverage_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) AS "LTV %" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) AS "LTV %" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_loan_balance') AS REAL) AS "Margin Balance" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_loan_balance') AS REAL) AS "Margin Balance" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

panels.title: Income Coverage Ratio (90d)
panels.description: Monthly dividend income divided by monthly margin interest. Higher is better.

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) / NULLIF(CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.current.monthly_interest_expense') AS REAL), 0) AS "Income Coverage" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) / NULLIF(CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.margin_stress.current.monthly_interest_expense') AS REAL), 0) AS "Income Coverage" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
